tool.name: MetaProSIP
tool.description: Performs proteinSIP on peptide features for elemental flux analysis
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir in_mzML && ln -s '$in_mzML' 'in_mzML/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in_mzML.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in_mzML.ext)' && mkdir in_fasta && ln -s '$in_fasta' 'in_fasta/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in_fasta.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in_fasta.ext)' && mkdir out_csv && mkdir out_peptide_centric_csv && mkdir in_featureXML && ln -s '$in_featureXML' 'in_featureXML/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in_featureXML.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in_featureXML.ext)' &&
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -in_mzML 'in_mzML/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in_mzML.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in_mzML.ext)' -in_fasta 'in_fasta/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in_fasta.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in_fasta.ext)' -out_csv 'out_csv/output.${gxy2omsext("csv")}' -out_peptide_centric_csv 'out_peptide_centric_csv/output.${gxy2omsext("csv")}' -in_featureXML 'in_featureXML/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in_featureXML.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in_featureXML.ext)'
## Postprocessing && mv 'out_csv/output.${gxy2omsext("csv")}' '$out_csv' && mv 'out_peptide_centric_csv/output.${gxy2omsext("csv")}' '$out_peptide_centric_csv' #if "ctd_out_FLAG" in $OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.label: Centroided MS1 data
Protein sequence database
Feature data annotated with identifications (IDMapper)
Tolerance in ppm
Tolerance window around feature rt for XIC extraction
Intensity threshold to collect peaks in the MS1 spectrum
Correlation threshold for reporting a RIA
Minimum correlation to mono-isotopic peak for retaining a higher isotopic peak
param.help: If featureXML from reference file is used it should be disabled (set to -1) as no mono-isotopic peak is expected to be present

param.label: Minimum R-squared of decomposition that must be achieved for a peptide to be reported
Decomposition coefficients within +- this rate window will be combined
Extension used for plots (png|svg|pdf)
Output directory for the quality report
Which element (single letter code) is labeled
Include identifications not assigned to a feature in pattern detection
Use averagine peptides as model to perform pattern detection on unidentified peptides
Whether purely natural peptides are reported in the quality report
Try to filter out mono-isotopic patterns to improve detection of low RIA patterns
Perform grouping
Minimum difference in correlation between incorporation pattern and averagine pattern
param.help: Positive values filter all RIAs passing the correlation threshold but that also show a better correlation to an averagine peptide. Disabled for values <= -1

param.label: The most intense peaks of the theoretical pattern contributing to at least this TIC fraction are taken into account
The most intense peaks of the theoretical pattern contributing to at least this TIC fraction are taken into account
The most intense peaks of the theoretical pattern contributing to at least this TIC fraction are taken into account
The most intense peaks of the theoretical pattern contributing to at least this TIC fraction are taken into account
Number of RIA bins for heat map generation
Fraction of observed/expected peaks
Minimum number of consecutive isotopic intensities needed
The minimum value of the score axis
param.help: Values smaller than zero usually only make sense if the observed peak fraction is set to 0

param.label: How RIAs are collected
Correlation threshold for reporting low RIA patterns
param.help: Disable and take correlation_threshold value for negative values

param.label: Overrides tool-specific checks
Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

param.name: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS
param.label: Optional outputs

data.name: ctd_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: ctd
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "ctd_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS
